item.title: The Tokens - The Lion Sleeps Tonight - Key of F
item.description: Chords: F, B, C Simple strum pattern: DU-U Challenging strum pattern: DUXU (X = Chuck/Chunk strum) How to chuck/chunk: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O5yFj1RnRvQ or https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MBBmUVqM6Vw

item.title: The Tokens - The Lion Sleeps Tonight - Key of C
item.description: This is a video I made for my elementary music students - it's in the key of C & can be played on soprano, concert, & tenor ukuleles.
